attributes.action: allow the Bevin Boys who passed away before 2007 to be posthumously awarded the badge which has recently been commissioned.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under the criteria put forward, only Bevin Boys who are still alive can be awarded the badge.  Many passed away before the 2007 decision to award the badge and their families feel that this is unfair and discriminatory.  The date of death is immaterial; the fact that service was given to their country should be the only criteria that needs to be satisfied

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
